channel.title: Norwegian ASR Literature Review
channel.description: A curated collection of reading lists and discussions focused on building Norwegian Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems, with emphasis on post-Whisper architectures and data curation strategies.
channel.itunes:author: National Library of Norway
channel.itunes:summary: A curated collection of reading lists and discussions focused on building Norwegian Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems.
